materials.raw_text:
- Scandium (Sc): 10 grams 
 - Silicon (Si): 1 gram 
 - Tin (Sn): 6 grams 
 - Zinc (Zn): 1 gram

sourcing.instructions:
- Scandium: Purchase from specialized metal suppliers or online marketplaces. 
 - Silicon: Obtain from electronics suppliers or chemical supply stores. 
 - Tin: Available at hardware stores or metal supply shops. 
 - Zinc: Can be sourced from metal supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
